languages.text: {n}Солитер не вмешивается, лишь обращает взгляд к эльдарскому воину, словно предвкушая услышать последнюю реплику пьесы перед тем как падет занавес.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Солитер весело пожимает плечами и кивает эльдарскому войну.{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza_HarlequinZanni

languages.text: {n}The Solitaire does not intervene, but shifts his gaze to Shairenkhei as if expecting to hear the last line of a play before the curtain falls.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Солитер не вмешивается, лишь обращает взгляд к эльдарскому воину, словно предвкушая услышать последнюю реплику пьесы перед тем как падет занавес.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El Solitario no interviene, pero desvía su mirada hacia Shairenkhei como si esperase oír la última línea de la obra antes de que caiga el telón.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Solitaire does not intervene, but shifts his gaze to Shairenkhei as if expecting to hear the last line of a play before the curtain falls.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solitario no interviene, pero desvía su mirada hacia Shairenkhei como si esperase oír la última línea de la obra antes de que caiga el telón.{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza_HarlequinZanni

languages.text: {n}独角没有介入，而是将目光转向榭伦凯，仿佛在等待戏中人在幕布落下之前，道出最后一句台词。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Solitaire does not intervene, but shifts his gaze to Shairenkhei as if expecting to hear the last line of a play before the curtain falls.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}独角没有介入，而是将目光转向榭伦凯，仿佛在等待幕布落下之前，这场戏的最后一句台词。{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza_HarlequinZanni

languages.text: {n}Le solitaire n'intervient pas, mais il pose les yeux sur Shairenkhei, comme s'il attendait d'entendre la dernière réplique de la pièce avant que le rideau ne tombe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Solitaire does not intervene, but shifts his gaze to Shairenkhei as if expecting to hear the last line of a play before the curtain falls.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le solitaire n'intervient pas, mais il pose les yeux sur Shairenkhei, comme s'il attendait d'entendre la dernière réplique de la pièce avant que le rideau ne tombe.{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza_HarlequinZanni

languages.text: {n}ソリティアは口を挟まず、幕が下りる前に芝居の最後のセリフを聞くことを期待するかのように、視線をシャイレンケイに移す。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Solitaire does not intervene, but shifts his gaze to Shairenkhei as if expecting to hear the last line of a play before the curtain falls.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ソリティアは口を挟まず、幕が下りる前に芝居の最後のセリフを聞くことを期待するかのように、視線をシャイレンケイに移す。{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza_HarlequinZanni

languages.text: {n}Der Solitär greift nicht ein, verlagert seinen Blick jedoch auf Shairenkhei, als würde er den letzten Satz des Stücks erwarten, ehe der Vorhang fällt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Solitaire does not intervene, but shifts his gaze to Shairenkhei as if expecting to hear the last line of a play before the curtain falls.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solitär greift nicht ein, verlagert seinen Blick jedoch auf Shairenkhei, als würde er den letzten Satz des Stücks erwarten, ehe der Vorhang fällt.{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza_HarlequinZanni

languages.text: {n}Kaçkın, müdahale etmese de perde kapanmadan önce oyunun son sözünü duymayı bekliyormuşçasına bakışlarını Shairenkhei'e çeviriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Solitaire does not intervene, but shifts his gaze to Shairenkhei as if expecting to hear the last line of a play before the curtain falls.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kaçkın, müdahale etmese de perde kapanmadan önce oyunun son satırlarını duymayı bekliyor edasıyla bakışlarını Shairenkhei'e çeviriyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza_HarlequinZanni
